high_descs: Turn left and face the dresser.
Pick up the alarm clock from the dresser.
Turn left, look and then face the lamp.
anns.task_desc: Pick up the alarm clock and turn on the lamp.

high_descs: Move to the white dresser to the left of the bed
Pick up the alarm clock on top of the dresser
Carry the alarm clock to the left side of the dresser
Turn on the lamp on top of the dresser
anns.task_desc: Carry an alarm clock while turning on a lamp

high_descs: turn to the left to face the dresser
pick up the alarm clock off of the dresser
move to the left to face the left side of the dresser where the lamp is sitting
anns.task_desc: examine an alarm clock by the light of the lamp on the dresser
